alert.note: Alert for James City (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:07PM EDT until June 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...CENTRAL YORK...SOUTHEASTERN JAMES CITY AND NORTHEASTERN SURRY COUNTIES AND THE NORTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 807 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Surry, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Fort Eustis around 820 PM EDT. Lee Hall around 825 PM EDT. Newport News and Denbigh around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rushmere, Lackey, Chippokes State Park, Oriana, Delk Crossroads, Lawson, Bacons Castle, Newport News Golf Course, Poolesville and Moonlight. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
